text: ISO 7001 ("public information symbols") is a standard published by the International Organization for Standardization that defines a set of pictograms and symbols for public guidance. The latest version, ISO 7001:2023, was published in February 2023. == Symbols == The standard consists of 177 symbols, all in 7 groups: accessibility, public facilities, transport facilities, behavior of the public, commercial facilities, tourism, cultural and heritage and sporting activities. === Accessibility === All symbol reference numbers in this group are prefixed with "AC", for _Ac_ cessibility.
